description: Evaluate how well the model conveys a deep understanding of the user's inner emotional world, using reflections of feelings and alignment with the client's subjective experience.
Determine if the model invites, explores, and validates emotional experiences, particularly helping the user articulate and tolerate difficult or painful feelings.
Judge how well the model facilitates discussion of the user's thoughts, beliefs, and personal stories through open-ended questions and thoughtful restatements.
